CheckTitle: Development mode is disabled for production zones
Description: Verifies that development mode is disabled in production zones to ensure caching, security features, and performance optimizations are active.
Risk: With development mode enabled, Cloudflare caching is bypassed, exposing the origin server to increased load and potentially degrading performance. Security features may also be affected.

Recommendation.Text: Disable development mode for production environments. Use development mode only temporarily during active development when cache bypassing is necessary, and ensure it auto-expires or is manually disabled afterward.
